p: For the isolation and identification of the fungi from the cheese samples, dichloran rose bengal agar chloramphenicol (DRBC) agar (Acumedia, Neogen, São Paulo, SP, Brazil), dextrose potato agar (DPA, Acumedia, Neogen, São Paulo, SP, Brazil), and chloramphenicol (Homeopatia Ouro Preto, Pirassununga, SP, Brazil) were used.
